InputReqInfo.title: InputReqInfo
InputReqInfo.description: This parameter takes input as Bathroom or Bedroom. If the User prompts 3 BHK, it means the number of bedrooms is 3. Similarly, 2 BHK means 2 bedrooms. If the user prompts 'Show me units with 2 bathrooms, take input as 'bathroom' and the number of bedroom or bathroom will be taken care of by NoOfRequirement variable.

Input_Property.title: Input_Property
Input_Property.description: This input is when the User prompts to search the units related to a property. The Property name that the user provides in the chat will be passed as a parameter. example: Show 3bhk units of Mantri Luxury Heights property.

NoOfRequirement.title: NoOfRequirement
NoOfRequirement.description: If the user asks to show units based on BHK, take the number before BHK to filter the number of bedrooms. Example: 4 BHK means 4 bedrooms. If the user prompts to filter units by bathrooms, capture the number or quantity of bathrooms and use it as a parameter.
